column1: #text=While looking for something to eat in our home , my wife and I decided it was time to go grocery shopping .
#text=First , we decided to take inventory on everything we had in the house , to see if we 'd need to buy more of it in our trip to the grocery store .
#text=After that , we made a list of things we need and want .
#text=After that we drove to the grocery store and got a cart .
#text=We walked around the grocery store , getting everything that we put on our list .
#text=After , we still had some extra spending money and decided to get some extra things .
#text=She was pregnant so she craves weird things .
#text=When we were done picking everything , we headed towards the cash registers to check out .
#text=We got everything scanned and handed the cashier the money to pay for everything .
#text=After that , we went home and put everything where it belongs .
